channel.title: MFA on Gerald Nguyen

item.title: What is a 2-Factor Authentication(2FA)?
item.description: The Wolf, the Kid, and the Goat You probably have heard of this popular fable before. Mother Goat in her wisdom had carefully secured her house and her Kid before going out. She even reminded her Kid to check the password before opening the door. Her password was good. It was very long and contained non-alphabets and special characters. As fate had it, a Wolf was nearby, he eavesdropped and learned of the motherâ€™s password.
